data.system_settings: Windows 10 Insiders Update build 16299.0 (according to bug-hunter-charter this OS version is allowed for crash reports)
data.client_settings: Discord Canary Build Number: 8713, Version Hash: e8078760b18055dd24ed717105af7d19419a600f
data.expected_result: You get the little popup to select people to create a group DM with
data.short_description: Trying to create a group DM via the button in the Friends list crashes Discord with the crash screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your Friends - Click the button next to Recent Mentions to create a group DM - The client crashes with the "Well, this is awkward..." screen.
